imdb.plot outline: Join the crew of a once famous online agency as they try and rebuild their shattered business after their Creative Director (Johan Joffemar) was embroiled in a scandal that drew national headlines. Johan was once the most sought after creative mind in the digital world. With a knowledge and flair far surpassing anything anyone has ever seen (or can seemingly understand), Johan along with the ever-manic agency owner, Jimmy Dasher and the relentlessly pessimistic salesman, Bill Bhoy built a digital agency few others could touch amongst the hype and hysteria of the Internet gold rush.
imdb.title: Creative Direction
plot: _Creative Direction_ (qv) is the story five dysfunctional individuals who - in order to reclaim their former glory - are forced to work with the one man who destroyed everything they built.

Join the crew of a once famous online agency as they try and rebuild their shattered business after their Creative Director (Johan Joffemar) was embroiled in a scandal that drew national headlines. Johan was once the most sought after creative mind in the digital world. With a knowledge and flair far surpassing anything anyone has ever seen (or can seemingly understand), Johan along with the ever-manic agency owner, Jimmy Dasher and the relentlessly pessimistic salesman, Bill Bhoy built a digital agency few others could touch amongst the hype and hysteria of the Internet gold rush.
